projects.title: AI Car Recognition
projects.description: Mission Ready ( Mission 2 ) - Prototype solution that allows a user to upload the picture of a car, and then find a similar car in their stock to recommend to customer.

projects.title: CLI Tool that manage and interact (AI requests) with MongoDB
projects.description: Mission Ready ( Mission 4 ) - This CLI tool was built on top of previous Missions 2 and 3, and it allows the user to manage and interact with a MongoDB database.

projects.title: Z-Energy - Map Feature Prototype.
projects.description: Mission Ready ( Mission 5 ) - Prototype proposal for a NZ company (Z-Energy). Where we used Google Maps Javascript API,  Typescript, Docker, MongoDB and NextJS as our Stack.

projects.title: Web Dev Resources
projects.description: I have a list of resources that resonate with me on my learning journey. And I decided to cook a small react project with all of them categorised and labeled. I hope you find them useful too.

projects.title: React Typescript Calendar - NextJS
projects.description: I've build this calendar as a following project for my article on how to build a Calendar from scratch with Typescript and React. I've used T3 Stack (Next JS) to build this project.

projects.title: Batcheehe - Batch Calculator
projects.description: A simple batch calculator for cocktails that allows you to calculate the amount of ingredients you need to use based a random ingredient or total amount.

projects.title: Coffeebara - Coffee Shop 3D Website Mockup
projects.description: I've wanted to try building a 3D website for a while now. And I've decided to build a Coffee Shop website mockup. I've used ThreeJS/React Three Fiber and Blender to build this project.

projects.title: Code Titler - VSCode Extension
projects.description: That's a boost up on my initial project CC Titles. I've decided to build a VSCode Extension that generates titles with uniform sizes as comment for several languages directly on VSCode.
